ProcessDefinition.Title: Retrievable Items Statistics Service
ProcessDefinition.Abstract: <DESCRIPTION>Once the conflated data has been prepared, a call may be made to this endpoint to retrieve statistics about the reviewable items in the conflated dataset. Initially, only a very small set of statistics are returned. </DESCRIPTION> <EXAMPLE> <URL>http://localhost:8080/hoot-services/ogc/ReviewableItemsStatistics?mapId=1</URL> <REQUEST_TYPE>GET</REQUEST_TYPE> <INPUT></INPUT> <OUTPUT></OUTPUT> </EXAMPLE>

LiteralInput.Title: Map ID
LiteralInput.Abstract: string; required; ID string or unique name of the map associated with the reviewable conflated data

LiteralOutput.Title: Statistics for the requested reviewable items
LiteralOutput.Abstract: This output contains a JSON structure containing statistics that describe reviewable items.
